componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: ACCOUNT ON STOP

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
PAY UPFRONT ACCOUNT

REQUEST PAYMENT FROM CUSTOMER

componentInstanceProperties.name: filterCriteria
componentInstanceProperties.value: ((Delivery_Date__c <= TODAY and (Collection_Date__c >= TODAY OR Collection_Date__c = NULL)) and Status__c <> 'Cancelled') and Is_Child_Mixed_Job__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: filterCriteria
componentInstanceProperties.value: ((Delivery_Date__c <= TODAY and (Collected_Date__c >= TODAY OR Collected_Date__c = NULL)) and Status__c <> 'Cancelled')

componentInstanceProperties.name: filterCriteria
componentInstanceProperties.value: ((Status__c !='Cancelled' AND (Delivery_Date__c <> NULL AND Collection_Date__c > TODAY)) or (Status__c = 'Awaiting Supplier Confirmation')) and Is_Child_Mixed_Job__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: filterCriteria
componentInstanceProperties.value: ((Status__c !='Cancelled' AND (Delivery_Date__c <> NULL AND Collected_Date__c > TODAY)) or (Status__c = 'Awaiting Supplier Confirmation'))

componentInstanceProperties.name: filterCriteria
componentInstanceProperties.value: Status__c IN ('Collected', 'Paperwork provided') and Is_Child_Mixed_Job__c = false
